summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account activity of Jeffrey Epstein for the month of March 2016. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and transfers, highlighting significant transactions and the account balance at the end of the period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary individual associated with the account detailed in the financial statement, showing various transactions and balances.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Alan Dershowitz is mentioned as a recipient of a payment from Epstein's account, indicating a financial relationship.

persons.name: Tonja Haddad
persons.context: Tonja Haddad is referenced in relation to a trust account that received a transfer from Epstein's account.

persons.name: Jj Litchford
persons.context: Jj Litchford is listed as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

connections.description: Alan Dershowitz received consulting payments from Epstein's account, indicating a financial relationship.
Tonja Haddad is associated with a trust account that received funds from Epstein's account.

events.title: Transfer of Funds
events.description: A transfer of $2,354,094.95 was made from Epstein's account.

events.title: Payment to Alan Dershowitz
events.description: A payment was made to Alan Dershowitz Consulting LLC from Epstein's account.

events.title: Transfer to Tonja Haddad Trust Account
events.description: A transfer of $61,930.00 was made to Tonja Haddad's trust account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Qtr, B3, Saint Thomas, 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document details account activity for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for March 2016.
Significant transactions include a transfer of over $2.3 million and payments to Alan Dershowitz and Tonja Haddad.
The ending balance of the account as of March 31, 2016, was $2,085,261.32.
